name: Chaos Ballz
description:
Chaos Ballz is an abstract arcade game where player have to capture balls that bounce randomly and keep increasing in number every time player capture the balls.

Player must capture a bunch of balls bouncing around in a small area with the smiley crosshair. Each color of the ball has a different score value. Every time player captures the balls, the game will add more balls equal to the balls that are captured. the grey ball cannot be captured, if that ball is captured player will lose a life point.

Controls:

Actions/DevicesControllerKeyboardCaptureAZ/KSpeed UpBX/LPauseStartSpaceMoveD-padWASD/Arrow Keys

This game was made using GDevelop, Piskel, and Bfxr.
